description: Enables AI agents to interact with ConfigCat, a feature flag service for teams.

environmentVariables.name: CONFIGCAT_API_USER
environmentVariables.description: ConfigCat Management API basic authentication username.

environmentVariables.name: CONFIGCAT_API_PASS
environmentVariables.description: ConfigCat Management API basic authentication password.

environmentVariables.name: CONFIGCAT_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Base URL for the ConfigCat API. Defaults to `https://api.configcat.com`.
